column1: Kata Robata////Wow! Customer service was phenomenal! Delicious food
column3: did not need a reservation.  The menu offered a lot of variation. Our server was hands down the best sushi server we have ever had.  He knew the menu well
column4: made spot on suggestions and seemed to really love his job - wish I knew his name
column6: built Asian guy.  I'm so glad we tried a new spot! Even my picky husband loved everything. Definitely try the kobe robata! It was divine!
